node.title: Staff Picks: October 2015 Edition
node.content:
30 days in 10 essential downloads from The FADER, Soulection, Fresh Moss, and more.

Soulection: White Label Series 001 – 016
The influential beat collective shares a living digital archive for all things White Label, spanning 16 editions, including the latest from Monte Booker, and bonus tracks.

Euro League: Continuum EP Volume 1
At 26, Euro League is fast emerging as one of rap’s ones-to-watch: a confident lyricist with a strong social conscience. Cop October’s long-awaited Euro Trip: Continuum EP Vol. 1 Bundle to unlock 5 tracks, lyric sheets, and album art, as well as a playlist of 5 of Euro’s most popular singles.

The FADER: FADER 100
For 16 years, The FADER has been the definitive voice of emerging music culture. To mark their 100th issue, they’re opening up their entire digital archive to fans, in a download spanning 4 videos and all 100 issues of The FADER.

Kasbo: Umbrella Club EP
Yung Kasbo is fast emerging as one of electronic music’s ones-to-watch; with a genre-bending production style that’s won him co-signs from Porter Robinson, Skrillex, and ODESZA (and millions of plays from listeners around the world). Umbrella Club marks the producer’s debut EP; featuring 5 tracks of original material.

Warren Haynes: Ashes & Dust Tour Sampler
Nine tracks of haunting Americana, handpicked by the GRAMMY Award-winning artist from the first live sets of his Ashes & Dust tour.

The Earls of Mars: The Earls of Mars EP
Prog-metal psychedelic vibes on the new 5-track EP from The Earls of Mars.

Different Sleep: ICYMI
Different Sleep is Rafa Alvarez; a Southern California native whose heady, chill production spans hip hop, trance, juke, and pop culture (witness: his recent Diplo and Friends set opened with an edit of Justin Bieber’s apology to fans). Grab the ICYMI Bundle to unlock a 20-track collection from Different Sleep, including 8 unreleased songs.

Frankie Lee: American Dreamer
The guitarist shares his debut album: a meditation on wanderlust, loss, and the so-called American dream.

Fresh Moss: Mirage Island
Newark, NJ-based rapper Fresh Moss returns with sleek flow, sharp lyrics, and a hard-hitting 7-track EP.

ANGELZ: BELIEVE IN ANGELZ
ANGELZ surfaced in 2014, gaining fast acclaim with a flurry of raw, genre-defying remixes, and propelling g-house into electronic’s mainstream. Download BELIEVE IN ANGELZ to unlock a 17-track box set from the producer, including 10 handpicked edits and 7 new, unreleased tracks.
